welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rotterdam, a city known for its modern architecture, vibrant cultural scene, and bustling port. We hope you enjoy exploring its charm and all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: Wagon train BBQ
restaurants.description: Wagon train BBQ is a bbq joint located in Schenectady.

restaurants.description: Canali's Italian & American Restaurant is a italian restaurant located in Schenectady.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European destinations and is the oldest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves both European and intercontinental destinations and is the largest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly intercontinental destinations and is the newest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
